title.narrative: Lusaka Transmission and Distribution Rehabilitation Project

description.narrative: The objectives of the Project are to increase the capacity and improve the reliability of the electricity transmission system in the Lusaka area.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :5.01 (a) | Description :The Subsidiary Agreement has been executed on behalf of the Recipient and the ProjectImplementing Entity | Due Date :28-Feb-2014
Finance Agreement :5.01 (b) | Description :(b) The Project Implementing Entity has adopted the Project Implementation Manual | DueDate :28-Feb-2014
Finance Agreement :5.01 (c) | Description :(c) The Recipient has established a Project Steering Committee and a ProjectImplementation Unit | Due Date :28-Feb-2014

Finance Agreement :5.02 | Description :The Additional Legal Matter consists of the following, namely that the Subsidiary Agreementhas been duly authorized or ratified bythe Recipient and the Project Implementing Entity and is legally binding upon the Recipientand the Project Implementing Entity in accordance with its terms | Due Date :28-Feb-2014
Finance Agreement :Co-financing Agreement | Description :The Co-financing Deadline for the effectiveness of the Co-financingAgreement is December 31, 2015. | Due Date :31-Dec-2015
